origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'EntertainmentInvestment.get_data', 'description': 'Get entertainment investment data for a specified period and region.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the time period for the data, e.g., 1 year, 6 months'}, {'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the region for the data, e.g., China, USA'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'investment_data', 'description': 'the investment data for the specified period and region'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解人民币市场的娱乐情况。首先，获取过去一年中国的娱乐投资数据。然后，分析这些数据，找出娱乐投资增长较快的领域。接着，获取这些领域的详细信息，包括政策支持和市场前景。最后，基于这些分析，推荐适合普通投资者的娱乐项目。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取过去一年中国的娱乐投资数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
EntertainmentInvestment.get_data
当前工具的参数'period'的值是什么?
1 year
当前工具的参数'region'的值是什么?
China

{'investment_data': '{"year": 2022, "region": "China", "data": [{"category": "Film", "investment": 100000000}, {"category": "Music", "investment": 50000000}, {"category": "Gaming", "investment": 200000000}]}'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'investment_data': '{"year": 2022, "region": "China", "data": [{"category": "Film", "investment": 100000000}, {"category": "Music", "investment": 50000000}, {"category": "Gaming", "investment": 200000000}]}'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
分析娱乐投资数据，找出增长较快的领域
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
EntertainmentInvestment.analyze_data
当前工具的参数'data'的值是什么?
{"year": 2022, "region": "China", "data": [{"category": "Film", "investment": 100000000}, {"category": "Music", "investment": 50000000}, {"category": "Gaming", "investment": 200000000}]}
{'analysis_result': '{"growth_rate": [{"category": "Gaming", "rate": 0.35}, {"category": "Film", "rate": 0.20}, {"category": "Music", "rate": 0.10}]}'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'analysis_result': '{"growth_rate": [{"category": "Gaming", "rate": 0.35}, {"category": "Film", "rate": 0.20}, {"category": "Music", "rate": 0.10}]}'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取增长较快的领域的详细信息，包括政策支持和市场前景
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
EntertainmentInvestment.get_detailed_info
当前工具的参数'category'的值是什么?
Gaming

{'detailed_info': '{"category": "Gaming", "policy_support": "The Chinese government has been actively promoting the development of the gaming industry, providing tax incentives and funding for innovative projects.", "market_prospect": "The gaming market in China is expected to grow at a CAGR of 10% over the next five years, driven by increasing internet penetration and rising disposable incomes."}'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'detailed_info': '{"category": "Gaming", "policy_support": "The Chinese government has been actively promoting the development of the gaming industry, providing tax incentives and funding for innovative projects.", "market_prospect": "The gaming market in China is expected to grow at a CAGR of 10% over the next five years, driven by increasing internet penetration and rising disposable incomes."}'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
基于分析，推荐适合普通投资者的娱乐项目
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
EntertainmentInvestment.recommend_project
当前工具的参数'analysis_result'的值是什么?
{"growth_rate": [{"category": "Gaming", "rate": 0.35}, {"category": "Film", "rate": 0.20}, {"category": "Music", "rate": 0.10}]}
